name: How to make Mediterranean Balela Chickpea Salad
description: This colorful Mediterranean Balela Chickpea Salad is hearty, refreshing and bursting with fresh herbs and zesty flavor from the fresh lemon garlic dressing. So easy, so delicious, and so satisfying! Turn it into an easy weeknight meal by serving it with pita bread!
recipeIngredient: 2  15 oz  cans of chickpeas (drained or 3 cups cooked)
1 tbsp red wine vinegar (or use a mix of balsamic and apple cider vinegar)
1/4 tsp cayenne or red pepper flakes

recipeInstructions.text: Chop up all your veggies, Add the washed and drained chickpeas, garlic, cherry tomatoes, bell pepper to a bowl and toss. Add the mint and parsley, and 1/4 tsp salt, and toss well.
recipeInstructions.name: Chop up all your veggies, Add the washed and drained chickpeas, garlic, cherry tomatoes, bell pepper to a bowl and toss. Add the mint and parsley, and 1/4 tsp salt, and toss well.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine all the ingredients for the dressing, and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, combine all the ingredients for the dressing, and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dressing to the salad bowl, and toss well to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the dressing to the salad bowl, and toss well to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately, or chill and store for upto 3 days. This side can also be served in toasted pita bread with Tahini dressing.
